data.name: CarX Drift Racing Online - Hit The Wall
data.detailed_description:
Have you ever thought how much damage your car can take?
Will it survive a collision with a tree? How about hitting a concrete wall? Have you ever thought of the damages your vehicle might get after you slightly touch the side of another car while going 80 km/h?
Well, you can now produce aftereffects of such an accident: cracks, rust, dents, scratches....
All such damage, plus a set of new "Sponsored" stickers will allow you to start writing a unique history of your drift car, without limiting your imagination.
This is going to be the history of your car, and you're gonna be its author.
More than 200 of new stickers from HIT THE WALL DLC is all you need for it.
Have fun!

data.supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Italian, Korean, Japanese, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 4590 or AMD Ryzen3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB (GeForce 950GT / AMD R9 270)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 11
  • Additional Notes: The application’s stability is not guaranteed on Intel HD Graphics and AMD HD Radeon on-board graphics cards.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ I5-8300H @ 2.30GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 1050GTX 4 Gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 11
  • Additional Notes: The application’s stability is not guaranteed on Intel HD Graphics and AMD HD Radeon on-board graphics cards.
